message: Hosting move to an SSD VPS complete. I guess you guys won't feel a difference though. Let me know anyway by checking http://gurustop.net

data.message: it performs well to me... UI needs to be revamped though
You mean minor things like extra spacing here and there, or the overall thing?
Actually I was thinking of better colors.. better typography.. some borders to separate stuff from each other
Also can't you limit the posts on the home page to display just a brief about the post ? Something like code.tutsplus.com
